name: Lancer Enhanced Combat Alt Frames
author: Ralf Ziegler
description: COMP/CON data for Lancer: Enhanced Combat, a combat supplement for Lancer, written and designed by Ralf Ziegler. Includes the IPS-N Bligh (requires the Wallflower LCP), SSC Oleander, HORUS Salamander (requires the Long Rim LCP) and the HA Habsburg.
